author: JerryRigEverything
description:
The new Samsung Trifold is about to go through some things. If you want to win one for yourself: https://www.dbrand.com/trifold just order anything from dbrands websites between now and the end of the year to be entered into a draw for a FREE Samsung Trifold. 

Get my smartphone tool kit here: https://www.ifixit.com/JerryRig

The newest folding phone from Samsung is called the Galaxy Z Trifold and it has TWO hinges instead of three. Making a 10 inch tablet that you can fold up and put in your pocket.  Its a really cool smartphone... lets cross our fingers that it survives the JerryRigEverything durability test today.
title: Samsung TriFold Durability Test: We found the limit.
